Text: Are you stronger than you thought you were?

Text: Everyone has become stronger.

Text: I'm not unique. You survive.

Text: You survive and going through trials you automatically become stronger.
translated_text: Du überlebt und durch die Prüfungen kommst automatisch stärker.

Text: So yes, we're getting stronger but will that help us?
translated_text: Also ja, wir werden stärker, aber wird das uns helfen?

Text: I hope so.

Text: Madam First Lady, may I show you some photographs from the United States?

Text: This is a picture I took on Fifth Avenue in New York.

Text: It's wonderful.

Text: I took this picture on the east side of Manhattan.

Text: This is a baseball game in Denver, Colorado.

Text: And this is from Florida as well.

Text: What do you say to the American people?

Text: I can say I really feel the support.

Text: When I was in Washington, I was handed a short letter written by a guy named Hector.

Text: He's a teenager 14 years old.

Text: He wrote me a short letter with words of support.

Text: By the way, if possible and Hector sees this program, I would like to tell him.

Text: The Hector, I remember it.

Text: I took your letter with me to Ukraine and it was charming and it was extremely touching.

Text: So it seems to me that normal people understand what evil is and that the attacker is evil.

Text: That it is normal to defend your country, your children, your homes.

Text: I'm sure that Americans themselves are like that.
translated_text: Ich bin sicher, dass die Amerikaner selbst so sind.

Text: What does the future hold?
translated_text: Was hält die Zukunft?

Text: We are dreaming about this.
translated_text: Wir träumen davon.

Text: In the past few months we've seen the human being is the center of everything.
translated_text: In den letzten Monaten haben wir gesehen, dass der Mensch das Zentrum von allem

Text: This is what makes us different from the aggressor.
translated_text: Das ist es, was uns vom Aggressor unterscheidet.

Text: They don't count their dead.
translated_text: Sie zählen ihre Toten nicht.

Text: We count every person who died and we want everyone still alive to feel confident and to have opportunities to grow.
translated_text: Wir zählen alle Menschen, die gestorben sind, und wir wollen, dass sich jeder

Text: That's what we dream about.
translated_text: Daran träumen wir.

Text: We want to see our country in the future.
translated_text: Wir wollen unser Land in der Zukunft sehen.
